涏字的基本解释

涏
tǐng
〔汫（
泾寒。j媙g ）涏〕ａ．小水。ｂ．波流直。

涏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［diàn］
［《廣韻》堂練切，去霰，定。］
见“涏涏”。

涏字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　涏； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页626第22
【廣韻】徒鼎切【集韻】待鼎切，?音挺。涇寒也。　又汫涏，小水。一曰波直貌。【爾雅·釋水】直波爲徑。【註】言徑涏也。　又【集韻】【韻會】?堂練切，音電。涏涏，美好貌。一曰光澤貌。

涏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
涏字的起名意思

指小水，也如媙，指女子美貌。

Rush
tǐng
〔汫（
Jing Han. j 媙g) 涏〕a. Xiaoshui. b. The waves flow straight.
Rush

["Guangyun" Tang practice cutting, go to chao, set. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[First Collection] [Shui Character Department] 　涏; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 626 22
[Guang Yun] Tu Dingqie [Jiyun] Waiting for Dingqie, the sound is pretty. Jing Han also.　Xiaohui again, Xiaoshui. One said Bo was straightforward. 【Erya·Shishui】Straight waves are the path. [Note] Words and directions are also swayed.　 [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Tang practice cutting, audio and video. Flush, beautiful appearance. One is the gloss appearance.

Name meaning
Refers to Xiaoshui, also like a 媙, refers to the beauty of women.
